output_list.description: The vulnerability exists in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`. It allows an attacker to create an arbitrary amount of tokens and transfer them to any user.
The vulnerability exists in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`. It allows an attacker to create an arbitrary amount of tokens and transfer them to any user.
Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.
Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.
